tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE government_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE government_projects (
 project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR(255),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 project_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE government_initiatives (
 initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE government_projects (
 project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR(255),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 budget DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE government_initiatives (
 initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
 department VARCHAR(100), 
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE project_evaluation (
 evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_id INT,
 evaluation_date DATE,
 outcome VARCHAR(255),
 evaluation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE government_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE project_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    metric_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE project_teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_lead VARCHAR(100),
    team_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE project_budgets (
    budget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    budget_amount FLOAT,
    budget_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE projects (
  project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  project_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE project_team (
  team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(255),
  project_id INT,
  team_lead VARCHAR(255),
  team_member_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE project_tasks (
  task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255),
  task_description TEXT,
  project_id INT,
  deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_progress (
  progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INT,
  completion_status VARCHAR(50),
  progress_notes TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE project_evaluation (
  evaluation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  evaluation_criteria TEXT,
  evaluation_score INT,
  evaluator_name VARCHAR(255)
);
